body.name: Steamer for Clothes, Hand Held Portable Travel Garment Steamer, Fabric Wrinkles Remover with Brush, 25s Fast Heat up, Pump System, No Water spray, for Home and Travel, ONLY FOR 120V
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 11 hrs 39 mins
features: Portable & Lightweight: The easy-to-grasp size makes it convenient to use it whether you're at home or traveling. Reduce the weight of your luggage and free up more space. Wipe away all the wrinkles of your journey and carry more beauty.

Fast Heating & Long Lasting: Just push the only switch and wait less than 25 seconds. It will deliver 10 minutes of steady steam. In a time crunch, it ensures your garments always stay in their best shape.

Advanced 360° Anti-splash Technology: Innovative electronic pump system and optimized hot pipe design. Our products work perfectly even when upside down, without spitting or leaking. Say goodbye to the outdated 45° sputter limit and enjoy a higher level of safety and convenience.

Upgrade Convenience: The newly upgraded power cord grows to an impressive 9.2 feet, there's no more scrambling around to find an outlet. Iron bedding, tablecloths, curtains, plush toys, and more with ease and safety. Uncover infinite possibilities for your home.

Multiple Fabric Friendly: Powerful steam output combined with gentle care. Removes wrinkles effortlessly from cotton, flannel, silk, and more. Rejuvenates different fabrics to show off your dressing style perfectly.

3-Years Warranty: Our products provide long-term, fast, and perfect customer service. Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions. NOTE: Please read the User Manual thoroughly and use it ONLY in 120V circuits(e.g., U.S.A., Mexico, and Japan. Use in Europe or other 220-240V areas may cause the machine to short circuit).

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: What is the applicable voltage for this product? (Important: Please check the voltage before use) This product is suitable for 110-120V. Suitable for countries such as the USA, Mexico, Japan, etc. But not suitable for countries in the Europe area. Can I add a plug adapter to use this product in a 220V country? Unfortunately, plug adapters cannot change the voltage, so this is not possible. What should I pay attention to during use? 1. Ensure the product is not directed towards anyone or objects; 2. Place the product in a safe area and wait for it to heat up or cool down. Can I install the brush accessories while using the product? No, it's not recommended. The nozzle panel gets very hot during use, and installing the brush attachment could lead to burns. It's safe to install the attachment only before heating or after cooling down. What should I do if my Steamer has no steam push on? If no steam, check water level, clear nozzle blockages, ensure power connection, allow preheating, and verify settings. Regular descaling helps. If unresolved, see manual or contact support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this specifically for my curtains and I must say it was very user friendly and did the job. My curtains were so wrinkle, I was skeptical of the steamer however I’m glad I made the purchase bc I literally use it on everything when I do t want to use the ironing board and iron.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This steamer is lightweight, heats up quickly and did not ‘spit’ out spots on my clothes. Water reservoir holds enough to get most of one garment done before needing a refill. I also like that you can just use tap water vs distilled water like old ones did. Woukd recommend. Also great price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars works for the most part
reviews.reviewText: I dont have to much issue with it- as i didnt expect much from this product. it does work pretty decently well, but you have to go over things s couple times before you start seeing some progress. it travels well, i took it over sees with me. very light weight, easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I used it and it still had more then half of the water tank full

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This item was smaller than I thought. It does not have a button you can hold down while using. It’s either just on or off. It doesn’t really get the wrinkles out and takes long if it does. Would not purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great until it stops working
reviews.reviewText: It was great when I first got, traveled with it few times with no issue. My last trip it just stopped steaming.. just pours out straight water now. Now looking for a new one that hopefully will last longer than 4 months use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the size of this ! To be so compact it was so easy to steam out the wrinkles in our clothes before leaving for my daughters bridal shower. 10/10 I would recommend . I’m purchasing a couple for gifts. Love it
